siteMetadata.description: Joystream is a video platform controlled, owned, and operated by its users.

hero.subtitle: Joystream is a video platform controlled,<0/> owned, and operated by its users

earnJoyCoins.subtitle: Hereâ€™s everything you need to know about Joystream and how to get started earning $JOY tokens

availableActivities.title: Available activities
availableActivities.subtitle: See the wide range of opportunities with which you can participate on our testnet

becomeFM.subtitle: Our brand new and unparalleled community token distribution scheme
becomeFM.title: Become a Founding Member to earn mainnet tokens and influence the development of the platform.
becomeFM.alternateTitle: Become a Founding member and have a tangible impact on the development of our platform.
becomeFM.link: Learn more about our generous program

whatWeDo.subtitle: Our motivation for building the Joystream protocol
whatWeDo.title: We call for an arrangement where media platforms are accountable to the people they impact.

exploreJoystream.title: Explore Joystream Now
exploreJoystream.subtitle: Two fast evolving apps for consuming content and governance activities.

atlas.text: Atlas is the flagship content consumer and publishing app for Joystream. Watch videos, follow creators and discover new featured content, or create a channel and build your audience.

pioneer.text: Pioneer is the place to participate in community governance and operation. Vote on elections, submit proposals to fund your project or get enter a paid role to power the platform.

Sparta.title: Sparta testnet
Sparta.text: Sparta is our second testnet, introducing a variety of important technical improvements.

Athens.title: Athens testnet
Athens.text: Athens is our third testnet, introducing a variety of important technical improvements.

Acropolis.title: Acropolis testnet
Acropolis.text: Acropolis is our fourth testnet, introducing a variety of important technical improvements.

Rome.title: Rome testnet
Rome.text: Rome is our second fifth, introducing a variety of important technical improvements.

Constantinople.title: Constantinople testnet
Constantinople.text: Constantinople is our sixth testnet, introducing a variety of important technical improvements.

Alexandria.title: Alexandria testnet
Alexandria.text: Alexandria is our second seventh, introducing a variety of important technical improvements.

Babylon.title: Babylon testnet
Babylon.text: Babylon is our second eighth, introducing a variety of important technical improvements.

Antioch.title: Antioch testnet
Antioch.text: Antioch is our ninth testnet, patching a chain split bug which broke the Babylon network

Sumer.title: Sumer testnet
Sumer.text: Sumer is our tenth testnet, facilitating easy content uploads via our playback app.

Giza.title: Giza testnet
Giza.text: Giza is our eleventh testnet, introducing V2 of the Storage and Distribution System.

Olympia.title: Olympia testnet
Olympia.text: Olympia is our twelfth testnet, introducing a new major runtime and V2 of Pioneer.

Rhodes.title: Rhodes testnet
Rhodes.text: Rhodes is our thirteenth testnet, enabling the launch of video NFTs.
